Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've recently made a lander using B9 legs and square parts modified to fit my goal, and it appears that right after landing that lander the 4 legs are correctly on floor and don't move, but the lander, directly attached to these legs, wobbles like if it was on some jelly? Do you have any idea on what's happening? can I modify this, even if I have to edit the cfg files?

Thanks

They wobble as far as I remember back, they had always some issues.

Well, 1.1 will break them, so they might as well be removed in the next version or if they aren't being redone to add suspension.

Oh that is sad they look so cool

Thanks for the reply though
